title: Happy Birthday, Honoka-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Happy birthday, Honoka-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Waaah!? T-, that surprised me-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, maybe popping 5 party poppers at once was a bit too much. I thought since I’m going to pop one might as well make it as loud as I can….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahaha! I was surprised, but it was fun~! Thanks, Kanan-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’m in charge of escorting you today, Honoka-chan. I shall take you to the birthday party location! There’s a feast waiting for you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>A feast!? Waaah, let’s get going then, Kanan-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, Kotori-chan and Kanata-chan prepared an extra large cake for you, so we have to hurry, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>An extra large cake! I’m so happy!! Kanan-san, let’s go, let’s go--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha. Hey now, that hurts. I’ll pay you back for that! Huug!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I won’t lose! Huug!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
